page.title: 06SADBERGE VILLAGE BUCK INN
page.content: There used to be four public houses in Sadberge but there are only two now,the{Buck Inn}and the{Three Tuns. I am going to tell you what happens in the Buck Inn because thats the pub my dad goes to.It is called the Buck Inn because a man called{John Buck,}who lived a long time ago left a lot of money to be used for the poor people of Sadberge.On the pub sign is a picture of him with a bag of money. People go to the pub to meet their friends,play dominoes or darts,have a bar meal or a drink of beer.Children are not usually allowed in the pub but sometimes we can go in on a Sunday dinner time for a Coke or orange drink.The Buck is open from 11am to 3pm and from 6pm to 11pm.Most people drink beer which costs 70p a pint.You can also buy whiskey,gin and rum. By Sarah Hodgson age 8.
